reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 352/06: VALUATION DAY FOR 2007 AND 2008 TAXATION YEARS
reg_info.reg_name_text: VALUATION DAY FOR 2007 AND 2008 TAXATION YEARS
reg_info.act_under: Assessment Act   Loi sur l’évaluation foncière

content.content: 1. For the purposes of section 19.2 of the Act, January 1, 2005 is prescribed as the day as of which land is valued for the 2007 and 2008 taxation years. O. Reg. 352/06, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of section 19.2 of the Act, January 1, 2005 is prescribed as the day as of which land is valued for the 2007 and 2008 taxation years. O. Reg. 352/06, s. 1.
